description: Malcolm and Angelo's chemistry was undeniable. They were even caught flirting behind the scenes. Malcolm was completely in awe of Malcolm's "plump and muscular" ass. He gave him the best rim job he's ever had. "It tastes so good." These two buff studs quickly let their sensations take over. You could see that they aimed to have as much fun as they could during that shoot and the result is satisfying - down to the last drop!
title: Malcolm & Angelo: Bareback
